verses.verse: I <WG1473> charge <WG1263> <WG5736> thee therefore <WG3767> before <WG1799> 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> the YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, who <WG3588> shall <WG3195> <WG5723> judge <WG2919> <WG5721> the quick <WG2198> <WG5723> and <WG2532> the dead <WG3498> at <WG2596> his <WG846> appearing <WG2015> and <WG2532> his <WG846> kingdom <WG932>;

Preach <WG2784> <WG5657> the word <WG3056>; be instant <WG2186> <WG5628> in season <WG2122>, out of season <WG171>; reprove <WG1651> <WG5657>, rebuke <WG2008> <WG5657>, exhort <WG3870> <WG5657> with <WG1722> all <WG3956> longsuffering <WG3115> and <WG2532> doctrine <WG1322>.

For <WG1063> the time <WG2540> will come <WG2071> <WG5704> when <WG3753> they will <WG430> not <WG3756> endure <WG430> <WG5695> sound <WG5198> <WG5723> doctrine <WG1319>; but <WG235> after <WG2596> their own <WG2398> lusts <WG1939> shall they heap <WG2002> <WG5692> to themselves <WG1438> teachers <WG1320>, having itching <WG2833> <WG5746> ears <WG189>;
And <WG2532> they shall turn away <WG3303> <WG654> <WG5692> their ears <WG189> from <WG575> the truth <WG225>, and <WG1161> shall be turned <WG1624> <WG5691> unto <WG1909> fables <WG3454>.

But <WG1161> watch <WG3525> <WG5720> thou <WG4771> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956>, endure afflictions <WG2553> <WG5657>, do <WG4160> <WG5657> the work <WG2041> of an evangelist <WG2099>, make full proof <WG4135> <WG5657> of thy <WG4675> ministry <WG1248>.
For <WG1063> I <WG1473> am <WG4689> now <WG2235> ready to be offered <WG4689> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> the time <WG2540> of my <WG1699> departure <WG359> is at hand <WG2186> <WG5758>.
I have fought <WG75> <WG5766> a good <WG2570> fight <WG73>, I have finished <WG5055> <WG5758> my course <WG1408>, I have kept <WG5083> <WG5758> the faith <WG4102>:

Henceforth <WG3063> there is laid up <WG606> <WG5736> for me <WG3427> a crown <WG4735> of righteousness <WG1343>, which <WG3739> the YY <WG2962>, the righteous <WG1342> judge <WG2923>, shall give <WG591> <WG5692> me <WG3427> at <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG2250>: and <WG1161> not <WG3756> to me <WG1698> only <WG3440>, but <WG235> unto all them <WG3956> also <WG2532> that love <WG25> <WG5761> his <WG846> appearing <WG2015>.
Do thy diligence <WG4704> <WG5657> to come <WG2064> <WG5629> shortly <WG5030> unto <WG4314> me <WG3165>:

For <WG1063> Demas <WG1214> hath forsaken <WG1459> <WG5627> me <WG3165>, having loved <WG25> <WG5660> this present <WG3568> world <WG165>, and <WG2532> is departed <WG4198> <WG5675> unto <WG1519> Thessalonica <WG2332>; Crescens <WG2913> to <WG1519> Galatia <WG1053>, Titus <WG5103> unto <WG1519> Dalmatia <WG1149>.

Only <WG3441> Luke <WG3065> is <WG2076> <WG5748> with <WG3326> me <WG1700>. Take <WG353> <WG5631> Mark <WG3138>, and bring him <WG71> <WG5720> with <WG3326> thee <WG4572>: for <WG1063> he is <WG2076> <WG5748> profitable <WG2173> to me <WG3427> for <WG1519> the ministry <WG1248>.
And <WG1161> Tychicus <WG5190> have I sent <WG649> <WG5656> to <WG1519> Ephesus <WG2181>.

The cloke <WG5341> that <WG3739> I left <WG620> <WG5627> at <WG1722> Troas <WG5174> with <WG3844> Carpus <WG2591>, when thou comest <WG2064> <WG5740>, bring <WG5342> <WG5720> with thee, and <WG2532> the books <WG975>, but especially <WG3122> the parchments <WG3200>.

Alexander <WG223> the coppersmith <WG5471> did <WG1731> <WG5668> me <WG3427> much <WG4183> evil <WG2556>: the YY <WG2962> reward <WG591> <WG5630> him <WG846> according to <WG2596> his <WG846> works <WG2041>:
Of whom <WG3739> be <WG5442> thou <WG4771> ware <WG5442> <WG5732> also <WG2532>; for <WG1063> he hath <WG436> greatly <WG3029> withstood <WG436> <WG5758> our <WG2251> words <WG3056>.

At <WG1722> my <WG3450> first <WG4413> answer <WG627> no man <WG3762> stood <WG4836> <WG5633> with me <WG3427>, but <WG235> all <WG3956> men forsook <WG1459> <WG5627> me <WG3165>: I pray 'Elohim that it may <WG3049> not <WG3361> be laid <WG3049> <WG5678> to their charge <WG846>.

Notwithstanding <WG1161> the YY <WG2962> stood <WG3936> <WG5627> with me <WG3427>, and <WG2532> strengthened <WG1743> <WG5656> me <WG3165>; that <WG2443> by <WG1223> me <WG1700> the preaching <WG2782> might be fully known <WG4135> <WG5686>, and <WG2532> that all <WG3956> the goyim <WG1484> might hear <WG191> <WG5661>: and <WG2532> I was delivered <WG4506> <WG5681> out of <WG1537> the mouth <WG4750> of the lion <WG3023>.

And <WG2532> the YY <WG2962> shall deliver <WG4506> <WG5695> me <WG3165> from <WG575> every <WG3956> evil <WG4190> work <WG2041>, and <WG2532> will preserve <WG4982> <WG5692> me unto <WG1519> his <WG846> heavenly <WG2032> kingdom <WG932>: to whom <WG3739> be glory <WG1391> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.
Salute <WG782> <WG5663> Prisca <WG4251> and <WG2532> Aquila <WG207>, and <WG2532> the household <WG3624> of Onesiphorus <WG3683>.
Erastus <WG2037> abode <WG3306> <WG5656> at <WG1722> Corinth <WG2882>: but <WG1161> Trophimus <WG5161> have I left <WG620> <WG5627> at <WG1722> Miletum <WG3399> sick <WG770> <WG5723>.

Do thy diligence <WG4704> <WG5657> to come <WG2064> <WG5629> before <WG4253> winter <WG5494>. Eubulus <WG2103> greeteth <WG782> <WG5736> thee <WG4571>, and <WG2532> Pudens <WG4227>, and <WG2532> Linus <WG3044>, and <WG2532> Claudia <WG2803>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the brethren <WG80>.

The YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> be with <WG3326> thy <WG4675> spirit <WG4151>. Grace <WG5485> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216>. Amen <WG281>. The second <WG1208> epistle unto <WG4314> Timotheus <WG5095>, ordained <WG5500> <WG5685> the first <WG4413> bishop <WG1985> of the Congregation <WG1577> of the Ephesians <WG2180>, was written <WG1125> <WG5648> from <WG575> Rome <WG4516>, when <WG3753> SHa'ul <WG3972> was brought before <WG3936> <WG5627> Nero <WG3505> <WG2541> the second <WG1537> <WG1208> time <WG2540>.
